title: Fancy Ice Cream Fail, Broken Social System 2.22.21
itunes:title: Fancy Ice Cream Fail, Broken Social System 2.22.21
description:
In episode 816, Jack and guest host Laci Mosley are joined by comedian Sara June to discuss the Texas storms, capital police being suspended, the Ample Hills meltdown, ‘Game Of Thrones’ Duo David Benioff & D.B. Weiss' next project, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Texas Storms, California Heat Waves and ‘Vulnerable’ Utilities
  2. 6 Capitol Police officers suspended, 29 others being investigated for alleged roles in riot
  3. Pentagon report reveals inroads white supremacists have made in military
  4. The Shocking Meltdown of Ample Hills — Brooklyn’s Hottest Ice Cream Company
  5. HBO Confirms Confederate Is Officially Dead
  6. ‘Star Wars’ Setback: ‘Game Of Thrones’ Duo David Benioff & D.B. Weiss Exit Trilogy
  7. 'Game of Thrones' Creators Close $200M Netflix Overall Deal
  8. David Benioff & D.B. Weiss Set Sci-Fi Drama ‘The Three-Body Problem’ As First Major Netflix Series; Alexander Woo, Rian Johnson, Rosamund Pike To EP
  9. WATCH: Classical music from Iran - Shahram Nazeri (1984) Gol e Sad Barg

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
